key.name: prompt-on-new-wifi-ap
key.summary: Whether we should show a dialog when a possible Wi-Fi network appears
key.description: Configures the behavior for discovery of the new networks and whether they result in a dialog being shown which allows for selection of the network.

key.name: auto-join-previous
key.summary: Whether to join networks we've seen before automatically.
key.description: This gets set for the Wi-Fi device in Network Manager whether it autoconnects or not.
